headline.main: THE GREAT QUESTION IS: WILL RUSSIA FIGHT ON?; Should Moscow Be Lost by Reds, Can And Will They Keep the German Armies Battling Thereafter?

lead_paragraph: Now the great question is whether the Russians will keep on fighting. In other words, even if he loses Moscow and the Kremlin, can and will Stalin keep an army of 2,000,000 or more men, with reasonable equipment, fighting the German invaders through the Winter and into next Spring? Much depends on the answer to that question and, so far as one can judge, the answer will be in the affirmative.
